statements: UPDATE transaction_fees SET fee_rate = 0.025, min_fee = 2.50 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE transaction_fees SET max_fee = 10.00, transfer_amount = 100.00 WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE transaction_fees SET min_fee = 10.50, max_fee = 25.75, fee_rate = 0.05, transfer_amount = 1000 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE transaction_fees SET fee_rate = 0.07, max_fee = 30.00, min_fee = 15.25, transfer_amount = 2000 WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 150.25, fee = 10.50 WHERE transaction_id = 123;
UPDATE fee_rules SET min_amount = 100.50, fee_percentage = 5.75, max_amount = 500.75 WHERE rule_id = 1;
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 100.50, fee = fee + 5 WHERE transaction_id = 12345;
UPDATE fee_rules SET fee_percentage = 2.5, max_amount = 500.00 WHERE rule_id = 3;
UPDATE transactions SET transfer_amount = 500.00 WHERE transaction_id = 1;
UPDATE transaction_fees SET calculated_fee = 75.00 WHERE fee_id = 3;
UPDATE transactions SET transfer_amount = 500, fee = 50.25 WHERE transaction_id = 1001;

UPDATE transaction_fees SET calculated_fee = (SELECT (transfer_amount + (transfer_amount * fee_percentage / 100)) FROM transactions JOIN fee_rules ON fee_rules.minimum_amount < transfer_amount AND fee_rules.maximum_amount > transfer_amount) WHERE fee_id = 2001;
UPDATE TransferRules SET min_amount = 100, max_amount = 500, fee_rate = 0.05 WHERE rule_id = 1;
UPDATE Transfers SET receiver_id = 2, sender_id = 1 WHERE transfer_id = 3;
UPDATE TransferRules SET min_amount = 100.50, max_amount = 5000.75, fee_rate = 0.005 WHERE rule_id = 1;
UPDATE Transactions SET fee_amount = 25.75, amount = 500.00 WHERE transaction_id = 10;
UPDATE User SET balance = balance + 100 WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
UPDATE Transaction SET updated_at = '2022-01-20 12:30:00' WHERE amount > 100
UPDATE User SET balance = balance + 1000 WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE Transaction SET amount = 500, fee = 50, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = 'a8b0abec-b7cd-4afd-8649-662c37c940aa';
